synonyms.synonym: Exchange factor directly activated by cAMP 1
Exchange protein directly activated by cAMP 1
Rap1 guanine-nucleotide-exchange factor directly activated by cAMP
cAMP-regulated guanine nucleotide exchange factor I

protein.general_function: Involved in cAMP-dependent protein kinase regulator activity
protein.specific_function: Guanine nucleotide exchange factor (GEF) for RAP1A and RAP2A small GTPases that is activated by binding cAMP

go_class.description: regulation of small gtpase mediated signal transduction
regulation of cellular protein metabolic process
regulation of protein amino acid phosphorylation

reference.reference_text: Kawasaki H, Springett GM, Mochizuki N, Toki S, Nakaya M, Matsuda M, Housman DE, Graybiel AM: A family of cAMP-binding proteins that directly activate Rap1. Science. 1998 Dec 18;282(5397):2275-9.
